message: Let's split it fairly, no need to negotiate too much. Accept and we can move on.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more for my negotiating skills.
I'm not willing to meet you halfway. I think I deserve more, considering the decreasing value of money.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve the majority of the money. Consider this a fair compromise.
I'm not budging on the majority stake, but I'm willing to give you a smaller share than before.
I'm not comfortable with your offer. I think I can do better, but I'm worried about the decreasing value of the money.

I'm not comfortable with your offer. I think I can do better, but I'm worried about the decreasing value of the money and the risk of going to Round 12.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think this is the last time I'll do that. Take it or leave it.
